actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of civil rights leader J.L. Chestnut, Jr.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives to the surviving family of J.L. Chestnut, Jr. Honors the life of J.L. Chestnut, Jr., as a recognized leader and powerful advocate for justice and equality.

titles.title: Honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of civil rights leader J.L. Chestnut, Jr.
